short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let's BiBi! Be real, be nice, and be legitimate.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OpenBiBi is a chrome extension that enables users to comment on any website, even those that do not have a built-in comment section, making it possible to share your thoughts where it was previously not feasible.
